value:
$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...This world is outside time itself.$k$pLike me, it is a paradox within time's
very fabric; it should not exist. It is
MY realm.$k$pHere, time ebbs and flows...
To the past...to the future...$k$p$Fo2000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|Children of Midgard, this realm is
outside of time...a world caught
between existence and nothingness.$k$pGullveig's curse seems to have
sealed us away here...$k$pWe must make our way to the
realm's edge. If we cannot reach
it, we may wander here forever.$k$pFortunately, however, the state
of this world affords me some
power over time as well.$k$pHere I am able to reverse time's
flow when we are in need.$k$pWhen you reach an impasse, you can
reverse time and choose another
path to tread.$k$pThough you may face despair ahead,
know that the light of hope does not
wane—it burns bright in my heart.$k$pNow, let us be off, children
of Midgard.$k$p
